data.name: Dominion - Menagerie
data.detailed_description:
Menagerie is the thirteenth expansion to Dominion. It includes thirty new Kingdom cards. There are Horses that save a draw for later, Exile mats that cards can be sent to and rescued from, and Ways that give Actions another option. Events return.


Dominion, that’s what you’re trying to achieve. This time with animals! They each have a lesson to teach, whether it’s how to spit really far, or what kind of grass tastes the best. It’s a lot to keep track of, but you’re like an elephant: you remember everything. And you’re afraid of mice. You’ve taken up riding. Horses are intimidating; they say you can lead a horse to water, but you haven’t managed it. So you’re working your way up, starting with dogs. So far so good; the dog hasn’t bucked you off yet.

Your menagerie got off to a poor start, with just a goat, two rats, and the adviser who suggested starting a menagerie. You couldn’t get that fox you wanted, but it was probably bad anyway. Now you’ve got some camels, which are just as useless for sewing as you’d been warned, and a turtle that can hold its breath for longer than anyone can stay interested. Soon the animal kingdom will be yours.

We hope you enjoy this expanding world of Dominion!

Themed Content


  • 12 card-shaped things use Horse: Bargain, Cavalry, Demand, Groom, Hostelry, Livery, Paddock, Ride, Scrap, Sleigh, Stampede, Supplies
  • 14 card-shaped things use Exile: Banish, Bounty Hunter, Camel Train, Cardinal, Coven, Displace, Enclave, Gatekeeper, Invest, Sanctuary, Stockpile, Transport, Way of the Camel, Way of the Worm
  • 5 Reaction cards: Black Cat, Falconer, Sheepdog, Sleigh, Village Green
  • 4 cards with weird costs: Animal Fair, Destrier, Fisherman, Wayfarer

Digital Optimizations and Custom Settings


  • Desperation - You can opt to automatically gain a Curse to proceed with Desperation
  • Exile - You can opt to have the game smartly decide when to ask if you want to discard Exiled cards
  • Way of the Butterfly - You can opt to skip Way of the Butterfly confirming that you want to return the card

data.short_description: Menagerie is the 13th expansion to Dominion. It includes 30 new Kingdom cards. There are Horses that save a draw for later, Exile mats that cards can be sent to and rescued from, and Ways that give Actions another option. Events return.
data.reviews:
“I think Events are great, I love Events. Exiling cards. I really like that concept. I like being able to take cards out of my deck, but they're not ACTUALLY out of my deck. Get these Victory point cards out of my deck, stick them there.”
Dice Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
